ygData.subject: Re: Warriors vs Hybrids
ygData.msgSnippet: i have seen all that everyone has said and in some cases i think being a ranger has it s advantages. and yes i believe that warriors need more skills not just
ygData.messageBody:
i have seen all that everyone has said and in some cases i think being a
ranger has it's advantages. and yes i believe that warriors need more skills
not just any skills but useful skills. berserker frenzy has little effect
when fighting anything at all. usually by the time berserker frenzy kicks in
it's way too late and i am well on my way to dying. But being a warrior has
it's advantages. when a group member is being attacked and needs help they do
not call the ranger for help they call me to pull it off them. i can't tell
you how many times i have been saved or saved others simply by having a
little more hp than everyone else. there is an excitement in holding a weapon
in my hand and brutally attacking my enemies. there is a glory in fighting to
the death and winning with only 10 hp left. we are the ones who take all the
abuse and get screwed in the loot orders. but it is our calling. if you like
rangers well then be a ranger but don't complain about being a warrior. we
are a special breed and we should never look downcast on our class but we
should fight with a pride in knowing who we are. of course thats just my
opinion i do not mean to anger anyone by this i am just proud and happy to be
a warrior. the game is what you make of it. goodluck to you all in your
quests and many battles you face

Beretta,fennin ro
